metadata.title: CVE-2016-6875 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Infinite recursion in wddx in Facebook HHVM before 3.15.0 allows attackersto have unspecified impact via unknown vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6875` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hhvm - 3.12.11+dfsg-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hhvm package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.12.11+dfsg-1build1').
